评论概述: It's a cute athletic skirt/skort, true to size.
评论详情: I am a 48 year old and used to sizes as they were from the 1990s through the 2010s. Are small, medium, and large still the same now, I'm not so sure as people here are getting larger, sizes might be aligning differently.  I ordered a medium. I am athletic, but not as much as I used to be. The jeans in my drawer are currently petite size 6 and my daughter's regular size 8 is just a little big for me. I always wear a size PM top.  The size M in this skirt fits me well. It's long enough on my petite frame to be suitable for my age range. It's short enough to still fit like an athletic skirt should. It hits me mid thigh. It's a little bit flippy, a cute nonfitted skirt style. The fabric is not too thin. The waistband is made of a double layer of the fabric so it lays flat while not slipping. It stays in place. The shorts underneath are very comfortable. There is a pocket on the left hip only.

评论概述: Great material and fits true to size
评论详情: The material is really nice and soft.  It fits true to size and seems like it will last and wash well. Unfortunately, it took a long time to ship so it is too cold to wear until the spring.

I`m a big fan of skorts. I find them very comfortable. This product has very good quality. The material is soft, the fit is great. It wraps up the waist line very nicely.  The length is perfect, it is not too short or long. It sits 4-5 inches above knees. It has a nice flare.  The short part is also very comfortable. It has a pocket on the side, great to place keys, phone etc. I wear size 8 or medium in US size. I weigh 133 pounds and I`m 5ft 2", as a reference. Medium fits me very well. I chose red. It is a very vibrant red, gives me great energy.  Overall I`m very happy with this product, easily receives 5 stars from me.

评论概述: It is not my favorite skort
评论详情: I ordered according to the size chart and it fits as expected. It is longer in the back which I am not a fan of- it makes it look unflattering on me. It is a decent quality skirt and washes well.
This work out skirt is so cute and comfy. It’s flattering. And I love the built in shorts.

This tennis skirt/skort is an economic addition to any activewear wardrobe. The high-waist design is both flattering and secure shaping tummies, and the built-in shorts provide great coverage and comfort during workouts or casual wear. The 4-way stretch material is soft, breathable, and moves with you, making it perfect for activities like tennis, running, or yoga.  The skirt has a sleek and stylish look that works well beyond just athletic settings—it’s great for an athleisure outfit too. The fit is true to size, and the fabric feels high-quality, holding up well after multiple washes.  I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because the shorts could use a bit more grip at the hem to prevent them from riding up during more intense activities. Otherwise, it’s a great piece of activewear.
This is a cute skirt. Works well for playing tennis. Not too long.

I am so impressed with this skirt! I wear a lot of these and I was Super impressed with this one right out of the bag. It's got the most amazing buttery soft feel. There is one pocket on the left side which is adequate for a ball or your phone. So far the under shorts haven't been riding up. The length is a little bit longer than others, which doesn't make it really long but good to know for those looking for little more length. I would 100% order this again.

This is a nice athletic skirt/skort, well made, & good quality fabric. However, the skirt is more flared out at the bottom than I'm used to wearing. Most of my skorts/skirts are more fitting at the hips. It runs TTS in the hips, but the waistband seems a little tight. For reference, I'm 5'9 120lbs 26 inch waist, I usually wear an XS-S. I got this in a small & it fits. I believe an XS would've been to tight in the waist. The only downside is that is doesn't have pockets anywhere (shorts or skirt). Price point is comparable to similar skorts. If you like the flared skirt, this would be a good option.
I ordered the small and it fits perfectly. Good quality and well made. The skirt is a nice length but the skirt is not fitted and reminds me of a cheerleader type of skirt. Still cute though.

评论概述: Nove tennis skirt, good serious fabric
评论详情: This is a very nice little tennis skirt. The fabric is substantial, not like the flyaway fabric used in some tennis skirts. I wish it had pockets in the shorts on both sides, as I am a leftie and that is crucial. I am 5'3" and 145 lbs...I should have ordered a large as this is very tight on me. Lesson learned.

评论概述: YITTY Active Women's UltraLuxe High-Waist Tennis Skirt with Built-in Shorts
评论详情: Awesome skort.  Has an athletic, yet feminine look to it.  Material is soft and comfortable and stretchy.  The shorts underneath fit comfortable and don’t ride up.  Fits true to size.

This little tennis skirt is super cute. It fits great on my daughter. I love that. It has the shorts underneath it with the little skirt. It really makes it. It is soft and flow and made of an athletic type material. The color is just as pictured. it’s a nice maroon color. It stretches and fits great and the waistband is not too tight.

Great name-brand athleisure wear! This skort is nice! Great quality material and stitching! The four-way stretch makes it easy to slide on and off. Gorgeous burgundy color that looks exactly as advertised. I followed the sizing guide based on my measurements and it fits true to size. I love that it has a hidden pocket underneath the skirt on the shorts. I ordered a large and it fits well and feels comfortable to wear. I love the flare! It compliments my figure well. It has a light compression. The skort is more than activewear, you can wear it casually as well! Great price point for such a quality piece!

Far and away one of the most comfortable skirts I've ever worn, the material is soft and compliant, while they fit true-to-size and lend a showy style to an athletic appearance. This is now among my go-to daily-wear skirts simply by virtue of comfort and goes-with-anything style.

My wife loves this tennis skirt. The material is good quality and thick. The color looks great in person, a deep burgundy just like the pictures. For reference she is 5’4 and about 130lbs and likes how the medium fits her. Overall she is happy with this skirt. The built in shorts are comfortable and the length of the skirt doesn’t feel too short for her. She thinks the price is fair for what you get. I hope that sharing my opinion and experience here provides you some value when shopping and deciding on something like this skirt, if so please let everyone know below.

This skirt is really cute and comfy. The fabric feel is really nice and smooth. The shorts underneath aren’t too tight although they do ride up a little. Like others have said it does flare out a little which I believe might go away after a few washes.  This skirt is a great value and will be perfect when summer comes back around! Highly recommend it!

评论概述: love that it has built in shorts
评论详情: my daughter says its super comfortable

This skort did not disappoint. It fits comfortably at the waist as a true high-waist. The fabric is stretchy, but sturdy. The skirt is modest, and the shorts don't show when standing/walking. The flow of the skort is flattering. I laundered it on a gentle cycle and let it air dry. As expected, the skort maintained its white color and size. The skort is appropriately priced for excellent quality.

评论概述: Nicely made, but the shorts are too short
评论详情: I like this skirt, it’s well made and the skirt itself is a little longer than I’m used to. However, my main issue is the legs of the shorts, they don’t have any of the silicone at the end of them to help keep them in place on your legs, and they are super short. This means they ride up super easy, so if you are super active and move around a lot, and have chunkier thighs, you may get some chafing.

评论概述: Can't recommend enough, love this brand
评论详情: I freaking love Yitty. Every piece I have from them is insanely great quality. True to size, comfortable, thick material without being suffocating, just fantastic. Truly may be my favorite athletic wear brand on the market right now.

评论概述: Cute, comfortable,  true to size and color
评论详情: True to size and color, deep red, medium. Super cute
This is comfortable. I wish the pleat was all over and just not in the back but that is personal preference. I do feel it runs a tad small. I am a true small
Fits true to size.  Quality material and design looks great.  One pocket on the shorts.  Waistband is very comfortable.
Cute flattering skort fits well and is easy to wash and dry.
